12.speaker: Moon
12.content: But just curious, why do you want to land on me so persistently?

13.speaker: Generator
13.content: Well.. I just want to advertise for my drink.

14.speaker: Generator
14.content: MoonShot Shot, A Shot For MoonShot!

16.speaker: Moon
16.content: You should say that earlier. I like your shot and would be happy to advertise for you.
